TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResXResourceWriter extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Resources.IResourceWriter
Public Class ResXResourceWriter Implements IDisposable, IResourceWriter
public ref class ResXResourceWriter : IDisposable, System::Resources::IResourceWriter
type ResXResourceWriter = class interface IResourceWriter interface IDisposable

summary.span: Writes resources in an XML resource (.resx) file or an output stream.

span.span: Writes resources in an XML resource (.resx) file or an output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以 XML 格式寫入資源。The writes resources in XML format. 寫入二進位資源檔，請使用。To write a binary resource file, use . 資源會指定為名稱/值組，使用方法。Resources are specified as name/value pairs using the method. 資源名稱是用於查閱; 時，區分大小寫。但若要更輕鬆地支援撰寫工具，並協助消除 bug不允許 a.resx 檔案只有大小寫不同的名稱。Resource names are case-sensitive when used for lookups; but to more easily support authoring tools and help eliminate bugs, does not allow a.resx file to have names that vary only by case. 若要建立 a.resx 檔案，建立唯一的檔案名稱，然後呼叫至少一次，呼叫寫入磁碟中的資源檔，然後呼叫關閉檔案。To create a.resx file, create a with a unique file name, call at least once, call to write the resources file to disk, and then call to close the file. 呼叫會隱含地如有必要的檔案。Calling will implicitly the file if required. 資源不一定會寫入其已加入的順序相同。The resources are not necessarily written in the same order they were added. 多個格式 a.resx 檔案的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用.resx 檔案以程式設計方式](~/docs/framework/resources/working-with-resx-files-programmatically.md)。For more information on the format of a.resx file, see [Working with .resx Files Programmatically](~/docs/framework/resources/working-with-resx-files-programmatically.md). > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含的連結要求和繼承要求套用到所有成員的類別層級。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A立即呼叫端或衍生的類別不具有完全信任權限時，會擲回。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. ## Examples 下列範例會建立名為的.resx 檔案`CarResources.resx`可儲存六個字串、 圖示和兩個應用程式定義的物件 (兩個`Automobile`物件)。The following example creates a .resx file named `CarResources.resx` that stores six strings, an icon, and two application-defined objects (two `Automobile` objects). 請注意，範例中所定義和具現化的 `Automobile` 類別，會標記為 屬性。Note that the `Automobile` class, which is defined and instantiated in the example, is tagged with the attribute. [!code-csharp[conceptual.resources.resx#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.resources.resx/cs/create1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[conceptual.resources.resx#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.resources.resx/vb/create1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立`filename`如果它不存在，則它會覆寫。This constructor creates `filename` if it does not exist and overwrites it if it does. 如果`filename`包括目錄路徑的完整路徑必須存在，或是建構函式會擲回例外狀況。If `filename` includes a directory path, the full path must exist or the constructor throws a exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資源不會寫入到呼叫。The resource is not written until is called. 已加入的資源必須是可序列化。The resource that was added must be serializable. 如果要加入的資源是字串，它會寫入做為字串;否則，資源會序列化並以二進位格式儲存。If the resource being added is a string, it is written as a string; otherwise, the resource is serialized and stored in a binary format. ## Examples 下列範例會建立名為的.resx 檔案`CarResources.resx`可儲存六個字串、 圖示和兩個應用程式定義的物件 (兩個`Automobile`物件)。The following example creates a .resx file named `CarResources.resx` that stores six strings, an icon, and two application-defined objects (two `Automobile` objects). 若要儲存圖示並`Automobile`物件，它會呼叫方法。To store the icon and the `Automobile` objects, it calls the method. 請注意，範例中所定義和具現化的 `Automobile` 類別，會標記為 屬性。Note that the `Automobile` class, which is defined and instantiated in the example, is tagged with the attribute. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫方法，如有必要之前釋放 managed 與 unmanaged 系統資源。The method calls the method, if necessary, before releasing managed and unmanaged system resources. 呼叫可讓所使用的系統資源重新配置用於其他用途。Calling allows the system resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

summary.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫方法，如有必要之前釋放 managed 與 unmanaged 系統資源。The method calls the method, if necessary, before releasing managed and unmanaged system resources. 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊和，請參閱和。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see and .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Generate() cil managed
abstract member Generate : unit -> unit override this.Generate : unit -> unit

summary.span: Writes all resources added by the method to the output file or stream.

span.span: Writes all resources added by the method to the output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將資源寫入輸出檔或資料流。The method writes the resources to the output file or stream. 如果您想要寫入的資源，以及為關閉的輸出檔或資料流，呼叫方法。If you want to write the resources as well as close the output file or stream, call the method. 一次呼叫方法。The method can be called only once. 之後呼叫方法中，所有以外的方法將會擲回例外狀況。After calling the method, all methods other than will throw an exception.

exception.span: The resource has already been saved.

span.span: The resource has already been saved.

span.span: This field is read-only.

summary.span: Specifies the schema to use in writing the XML file.

span.span: Specifies the schema to use in writing the XML file.

summary.span: This field is read-only.

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構描述會提供有關如何編碼取決於要寫入的資源類型的資源詳細資料。The schema provides details on how to encode the resources based on the type of resource being written.
